title: Resident Evil: Resistance + 2 DLCs + Multiplayer
body:
Resident Evil: Resistance + 2 DLCs + Multiplayer


Genres/Tags: Action, Survival, Third-person
Companies: Capcom, NeoBards Entertainment, M-Two
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI12
Original Size: 25.3 GB
Repack Size: 14.9 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehosters: Yandex.Disk + many others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehosters: Yandex.Disk + many others (Single File) (Uploaded by crackhub213)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Stean release Build 5576574: 25.3 GB, thanks to chronos!
  • Goldberg emu/crack applied over
  • 2 DLCs (Male Survivor Costume: Leon S. Kennedy, Female Survivor Costume: Claire Redfield) are included and activated
  • Alternative CreamAPI crack is located in NoDVD folder after installation, allowing multiplayer support via Steam, check readme.txt in “Steamworks Fix” subfolder
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 25.3 to 14.9 GB)
  • Installation takes from 3 minutes on 16-threads CPU to 10 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 25.3 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Experience a new 1 vs 4 online multiplayer game set in the Resident Evil universe where four survivors face-off against a sinister Mastermind.

As the Mastermind your aim is to prevent the survivors from escaping by whatever means necessary. At your disposal will be all manner of tools including summoning vicious monsters, setting deadly traps, weaponizing cameras and more!

In turn, the Survivors must work together to fend off the Mastermind’s attacks and complete puzzle style objectives to escape the map before time runs out!
